content: please note this is not a free pattern i have tried unsuccessfully to take the free statement out this kitchen towel holder is so simple and fun to make i have many so that i can change them out according to the season or holiday you will need cotton yarn i used i love this cotton yarn a 3 metal ring and a decorative button i have written this pattern to the best of my ability if you find any errors or inconsistencies please contact me and i will make the correction and send you a new pattern if you make a towel holder please add it to my projects so that i and others can enjoy your work copyright 2019 by carole martin this pattern is an original design by carole martin and is not intended for distribution in any form you may not change alter or sell this pattern in any format you may sell the item s that you make just please include the link https //www ravelry com/patterns/sources/its-just-a-yarn-things-ravelry-store on your listing giving me credit for the pattern
